author: Special Correspondent
text: DMK leader M. Karunanidhi on Sunday said if the failures and shortcomings of the AIADMK government has enthused his party to prepare itself for the Assembly polls, the Namakku Naame road show conducted by his son and party treasurer M.K. Stalin had won the goodwill of all sections of society. In a statement, Mr. Karunanidhi said he had coined the title “Namakku Naame ” when Mr. Stalin approached him with a request after deciding to undertake the tour across 234 constituencies. “Mr. Stalin’s tour programme has created jitters in the ruling party camp. It is not an exaggeration to say that his tour has galvanised the party organisation and cadres alike,” he said.
title: Karunanidhi hails Stalin’s road show
